story_06_01000/2401_1001_0100_10:
All right! Everybody ready for takeoff?
We’ve gotta go find the PML Leaders in
charge of the remaining badges!
story_06_01000/2401_1001_0300_10:
Are you OK, Rosa?
Why the long face all of a sudden?
story_06_01000/2401_1001_0400_10:
I’m fine! I just can’t stop thinking about that
jerk, Lear, from before...
story_06_01000/2401_1001_0500_10:
It’s wrong the way he treats Pokémon like tools,
and I don’t agree with the way he thinks,
but the fact is...he’s still really strong.
story_06_01000/2401_1001_0600_10:
And I bet there’ll be others just as strong as
he is when we get to the tournament matches...
story_06_01000/2401_0301_0700_10: Then we’ve gotta get stronger, too!
story_06_01000/2401_0401_0800_10:
You’re right, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
I was just thinking the same thing.
story_06_01000/2401_0302_0900_10: Then we need to train even harder!
story_06_01000/2401_0402_1000_10:
You’re right, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
I was just thinking the same thing.
story_06_01000/2401_1001_1100_10:
Aha! In other words, you want to see if we
can power up our team around here in the
meantime, right?
story_06_01000/2401_1001_1200_10:
If that’s the case, why don’t we go pay the
Evolution fighter a visit!
story_06_01000/2401_1001_1400_10:
Supposedly she’s a pretty amazing Trainer.
I’ve heard whispers of her skill in the wind
more than a few times!
story_06_01000/2401_1001_1500_10:
She trains with her Pokémon nonstop,
and I hear that sync pairs who train with
her all end up getting a lot stronger!
story_06_01000/2401_1001_1600_10:
Whoa! This girl sounds incredible!
You sure convinced me!
story_06_01000/2401_1001_1700_10:
C’mon, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
Let’s go find this Evolution fighter!
story_06_01000/2401_0401_1900_10:
Yes! I love that enthusiasm!
I’ll be right behind you, friend!
story_06_01000/2401_0402_2100_10:
Yeah! If we raise our team’s strength now,
we can rise through the ranks in no time
once the tournament begins!
story_06_01000/2401_1001_2200_10:
OK! Let’s take a break from collecting
badges for a little while, then!
story_06_01000/2401_1001_2300_10:
Come on! Off to the Evolution fighter we go!
It’s time for takeoff!
